body.p: includes a specialized YAML editor with various editing features for files that have the yaml/yml file extension. It also includes a document template to help you get started with YAML documents. The template is called YAML and it can be found in the New Document folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard.You can experiment with a sample of a YAML file available at: [OXYGEN-INSTALL-DIR]/samples/yaml/personal.yaml.

section.title: Text Mode Editor
section.p:
When editing YAML documents in the Text editing mode, the usual text editing actions are available, along with other YAML editor-specific actions, including:
Syntax highlighting
Automatic validation
Formatting and indenting
